flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36>>36 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36=$<<120+36=159>>159
So he makes 159*25=$<<159*25=3975>>3975 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3975*4=$<<3975*4=15900>>15900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156, not 159. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
